issue.title: [C++] index kernel missing support for decimal, null, and fixed_size_binary
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13947](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13947). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The "index" kernel should support any equatable type.  At the moment it does not support decimal, fixed_size_binary, or null.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13947?focusedCommentId=17434505) by David Li (lidavidm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11370
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11370>
